Wrapping and unwrapping text

Parent topic: Working with DITA topics

To wrap text

  1. Select the text that you want to wrap in element tags.
  2. Make the element list appear:
    • Right-click the selected text and choose Refactoring > Surround with tags.
    • Press Enter.
    • Press Ctrl+E.
  3. In the displayed list of elements, select the correct element and press Enter.
Related concepts
  • What is an element?

To unwrap text

Do one of the following:
  • Position your cursor right after the opening element tag and press Backspace.
  • Right-click one of the surrounding element tags and choose Refactoring > Delete element tags.
Related concepts
  • What is an element?
